name: Sheol (dcjam 2022)
description:
Once i was dragged into Sheol.

Nobody could save me.

One day i decided to get away from Sheol.

SHEOL is a Dungeon Crawler about a dimension called "Sheol".

Bugs:

After reaching the green cube, colision may stop work.

Hitting "Resume" button will disable key input. To fix, click on "Quit" button to restart game.

Art, Code, 3d Models, some SFX - Thiago Yasue

Ambient Sound and other SFX - Opengameart

Created for DungeonCrawler Jam 2022
